name: The Lantern of Mercy
core: Compassion applied with clarity suggests the next step can be made without cruelty.
shadow: Mercy becomes indulgence when consequence is refused entirely.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward acting kindly without surrendering judgment.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests withholding the verdict until the whole matter is seen.

name: The Oathkeeper
core: Duty faithfully carried suggests the reading should be grounded in what has already been pledged.
shadow: Duty becomes bondage when the oath outlives the truth that formed it.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates a promise can still guide clean action.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests reviewing whether the obligation remains rightful.

name: The Quiet Covenant
core: Trust preserved in silence suggests that not every truth must be spoken at once.
shadow: Silence becomes concealment when it protects what should be revealed.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward honoring the bond while moving deliberately.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports restraint, privacy, and measured disclosure.

name: The Shield of Dawn
core: Protection rightly used suggests the vulnerable can be defended without widening the conflict.
shadow: Protection becomes control when shelter is used to deny another's agency.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates protective action can be taken cleanly now.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests fortifying the boundary before stepping outward.

name: Radiant Balance
core: Radiant Balance suggests opposing pressures can be held in proportion without erasing their differences.
shadow: Balance becomes paralysis when every claim is treated as equally binding.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward proportionate action guided by a steady center.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports re-centering, de-escalation, and careful alignment.

name: The Healing Spring
core: Restoration suggests the reading is not asking for brilliance, but for repair that lasts.
shadow: Healing becomes denial when restoration is claimed before the wound is understood.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates active repair can begin in practical ways.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests rest and mending should take precedence over advancement.

name: The Witness Star
core: Truth seen without ornament suggests that honest recognition is the holiest act available here.
shadow: Witness becomes accusation when seeing is used as a weapon rather than a guide.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward naming the truth with precision and restraint.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests observing a little longer before speaking.

name: The Measured Verdict
core: Discernment suggests that judgment can clarify the path when it is made without haste.
shadow: Judgment becomes severity when complexity is forced into a simpler shape than truth allows.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates a careful decision can now be rendered.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports review before any final word is spoken.

name: The Sacred Hearth
core: Sanctuary suggests that what is protected at the center should not be exposed for convenience.
shadow: Sanctuary becomes withdrawal when safety is used to avoid all risk and relation.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward strengthening the center before reaching outward.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports retreat, replenishment, and guarded preservation.

name: The Pilgrim's Grace
core: Grace in motion suggests that progress need not be forceful to be real.
shadow: Grace becomes evasion when softness refuses the demands of the road.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates forward movement can remain gentle and exact.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests shortening the journey until footing is secure.

name: The Veil of Benediction
core: A quiet blessing suggests protection may be present even where certainty is not.
shadow: Blessing becomes passivity when it is used to excuse inaction entirely.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward moving with trust, but not carelessness.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports staying close to what has already proven sound.

name: The Last Sanctuary
core: Final refuge suggests there is still a place from which the matter can be steadied and renewed.
shadow: Refuge becomes stagnation when shelter is never meant to open again.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates security can support the next clear movement.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests remaining under protection until the strain has passed.
